name: Flippy Ski
description:
Merry Christmas!!!

Compete in a massive high speed ski race as "Santa Claus"

Move left and right to avoid obstacles and collect stars.

Spin the ski board in the air for a massive speed boost.

Avoid the obstacles and use ramps for that awesome air-time.

Complete the challenging missions (up coming) to unlock new ski boards and difference characters (on the way)

Are you ready for the ultimate racing experience?
publishers: YOMOB INTERNATIONAL CO., LTDVistra Corporate Services Centre
